sourceMeaningMnemonic: In the <radical>cage</radical> there are some <radical>legs</radical>. They are the legs attached to a <kanji>small animal</kanji>.
meaningInfo: You can only see the legs, though, because a cloth is covering the cage. What kind of small animal is it? Try to look.
readingMnemonic: You look up through the cloth, and see a hairless cat. This <kanji>small animal</kanji> is hairless, but most surprisingly is covered in <reading>hickie</reading>s (<ja>ひき</ja>).
readingInfo: Who is giving this cat all those hickies? Pretty gross, if you ask me.
